document.title: Anatomage Table 6

keywords.keyword: Anatomage Table 6; 3D Virtual Anatomy Tools; virtual dissection; anatomy education; medical simulation technology

document.abstract: Anatomage Table 6, which launched in the fall of 2018, is the latest software for users of the Anatomage Virtual Dissection Table. Anatomage Table 6 comprises numerous virtual anatomy dissection and study tools for use by anatomy students and instructors. This review provides an overview and assessment of Anatomage Table 6’s primary tools and advanced navigation features.

field.name: comments
field.value: ACKNOWLEDGEMENT: The University of Tennessee, Knoxville Libraries’ Anatomage Table was purchased through a grant from the Gladys Brooks Foundation, a supporter of nonprofit libraries, educational institutions, hospitals, and clinics.
